extendedInfo.description: Doodle Heroes is an easy-to-play jumper game and the Best Jumper Game on the Market!! with very good looking graphics and inmersive gameplay, just tilt your phone to jump on the platforms and advance higher and higher, how far can you get?.Experience hours of fun in 4 different and very fun game modes(1 in Free Version). And help Cookie and Cherry, our madly inlove heroes in their neverending adventure!CLASSIC MODE.-Jump! Jump! Jump! the higher you get, the better! enjoy the variety of platforms to jump on, some of them will move, some will dissapear or explode! Use the large amount of items available to your advantage, rockets to push you higher, springs or the 4 colored circles and their special abilities. And be very carerul, there are some monsters in the area!DOWN MODE(Full Only).-You tought going up was the only thing? in this mode you have to go down, caring not to fall off the platforms! But as you are going down, speed is going up! Very challenging. Items and Monsters are here too!CHALLENGES MODE(Full Only).-What about some special assignments for Agent Cookie and Agent Cherry, our beloved and most skilled Secret Agents? In this mode you have to get certain task, given to you by the president of Doodleland. Isnt that challenging enough? it may have some special condition too!Monsters, items(many are this mode exclusive!), special platforms, everything is here too!RIGHT MODE(Full Only).-Go to the right! Monsters, items, just a few platforms, how far can you get?Features:-Experience hours of fun in 4 game modes(1 in free)-2 Heroes to play with-48 Achievements for you to unlock(full only)-2 Different Themes (memes as special guests!)-Fight a big variety of enemies (16 per theme)-22 Items to help you-Easy to play-Good looking cute graphics-global leaderboards to save your scoreFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/ZorythGTwitter: https://twitter.com/ZorythGNo birds were harmed (or made angry) during development of this game, nor any rope was cut, or any ninja ate fruit, for all we know.Tags: action, entertainment, casual, temple, Strategy, plumber, lookuot, run, root, battery, launcher, doodle

reviews.title: SO BAD
reviews.comment: The clouds glitch and when i start off i die.

reviews.comment: Very hard to control,gets very boring in a short time. Waste of time.

reviews.comment: It sucks hard to control. Dont even bother to download this game.

reviews.title: Best game eveeeer!
reviews.comment: With the new update we now have global leaderboards! Best game ever!!

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: This game is horrible. Don\'t waste your time. The clouds you can\'t jump on in the background quickly confuse you. I HATE this game. DO NOT INSTALL!
reviews.author: Isabella Smith

reviews.title: You keep falling.
reviews.comment: Not worth it. Get a better game.
reviews.author: Reina Num
